Name: Deal Name
Description: The title of the deal associated with this quote.

Name: Quote Approver
Description: The approver for this quote. This is a legacy quote property.

Name: Is Archived
Description: Indicates if this quote is archived or not

Name: Buyer Tax ID
Description: Tax types and IDs for a buyer company

Name: Comments to buyer
Description: Comments to the buyer. This property is not filled for CPQ_QUOTE template types

Name: Created by user ID
Description: The user who created this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Create date
Description: The date the quote was created

Name: Currency
Description: Currency code for the quote

Name: Display TCV on Quote
Description: Indicates if total contract value (TCV) should be displayed on the published quote

Name: Automated taxes enabled
Description: Whether or not automated tax is enabled for the quote

Name: ESign Date
Description: The date and time the quote was signed by all signers. This includes countersigners. This will be empty or 0 if the quote has not been fully signed.

Name: ESign enabled
Description: Indicates if esign is enabled for quote

Name: ESign completed signatures
Description: Number of completed signatures collected so far

Name: ESign number of signers required
Description: Total number of signers required for this quote to be fully signed. This includes both contact signers and countersigners.

Name: Expiration date
Description: The date that this quote expires

Name: Expired
Description: Value representing whether this quote is expired

Name: Quote approval feedback
Description: Feedback about this quote during the approval process

Name: Language
Description: The language for displaying this quote publicly

Name: Last Buyer Interaction Date
Description: The date of the last buyer interaction

Name: Last published date
Description: The date and time of the last time this quote was published.

Name: Last sent date
Description: The last time the quote was sent through the HubSpot quote email sender.

Name: Last modified date
Description: The last time any property on the quote was modified

Name: Locale
Description: The locale for displaying this quote publicly

Name: Has been manually signed
Description: Indicates whether the quote has been marked signed.

Name: Merged record IDs
Description: The list of record IDs that have been merged into this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Record ID
Description: The unique ID for this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Record source detail 1
Description: First level of detail on how this record was created.

Name: Record source detail 2
Description: Second level of detail on how this record was created.

Name: Record source detail 3
Description: Third level of detail on how this record was created.

Name: Record source
Description: How this record was created.

Name: Payment date
Description: The date and time the quote was paid by the customer. This will be 0 if the payment is processing and empty if the quote is not paid.

Name: Payment enabled
Description: Indicates if payment can be collected via the quote link

Name: Quote payment status
Description: An enumeration representing the current status of payments on a quote. This is purely for information and should not be updated manually. Check the values for more states.
Options: Pending (PENDING); Processing (PROCESSING); Paid (PAID); No payment options (PAYMENT_NOT_ENABLED)

Name: Quote PDF download link
Description: The link to download a pdf of a quote

Name: PO number
Description: Purchase order number

Name: Quote amount
Description: The total amount due for the quote. This can be either total contract value or the amount due at checkout depending on portal settings

Name: Quote Amount in Home Currency
Description: The quote amount in the portal's home currency. This will not be updated if the home currency is changed

Name: Signing Status
Description: Calculated status for quote e-signature progress based on esign enablement and signature completion

Name: Link to hosted Quote
Description: The url hosting the public quote. This will be empty if the quote is not publicly available.

Name: Quote number
Description: Reference number shown on quote document

Name: Quote Owner ID
Description: The owner of this quote. This will be the associated deal's owner or the quote's creator if there is no associated deal.

Name: Quote Status
Description: Derived quote status for CRM indexing
Options: Draft (DRAFT) [READ-ONLY]; Pending approval (PENDING_APPROVAL) [READ-ONLY]; Changes requested (CHANGES_REQUESTED) [READ-ONLY]; Published (PUBLISHED) [READ-ONLY]; Publishing (PUBLISHING) [READ-ONLY]; Accepted (ACCEPTED) [READ-ONLY]; Expired (EXPIRED) [READ-ONLY]; Void (VOID) [READ-ONLY]; Archived (ARCHIVED) [READ-ONLY]

Name: Has space for manual countersignature
Description: Indicates whether the quote should have a place for a manual countersignature

Name: Has space for manual signature
Description: Indicates if the quote document should have a place for a written signature

Name: Internal quote status
Description: The current status of the quote.
Options: Draft (DRAFT); Pending approval (PENDING_APPROVAL); Rejected (REJECTED); Approved (APPROVED); Approval not needed (APPROVAL_NOT_NEEDED); Accepted (ACCEPTED); Voided (In development) (VOID)

Name: Can store payment method at checkout
Description: Whether the option to store payment method is available to a customer at checkout

Name: Total Contract Value
Description: The total contract value (TCV) of this quote.

Name: Terms
Description: The terms of the quote.

Name: Time zone
Description: Timezone for displaying dates on the quote

Name: Quote title
Description: The title of this quote

Name: Updated by user ID
Description: The user who last updated this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Quote owner
Description: The owner of the quote

Name: HubSpot team
Description: The name of the team associated with the owner of the quote

Name: Last Contacted
Description: The last timestamp when a call, email or meeting was logged for this quote

Name: Last Activity Date
Description: The last time a note, call, email, meeting, or task was logged for a quote. This is set automatically by HubSpot based on user actions in the quote record.

Name: Number of times contacted
Description: The number of times a call, email or meeting was logged for this quote

Name: Number of Sales Activities
Description: Number of sales activities for this quote

Name: Sender company street address
Description: The street address of the company sending this quote

Name: Sender company street address 2
Description: The second line of the street address of the company sending this quote

Name: Sender company city
Description: The city in which the company sending this quote is located

Name: Sender company country
Description: The country in which the company sending this quote is located

Name: Sender company domain
Description: The domain of the company sending this quote

Name: Sender company image URL
Description: URL to image of the sender company image to be set on the quote

Name: Sender company name
Description: The name of the company sending this quote

Name: Sender company state/region
Description: The state/region in which the company sending this quote is located

Name: Sender company postal code
Description: The zip code in which the company sending this quote is located

Name: Sender email
Description: Email address of the sender of this quote

Name: Sender first name
Description: First name of the sender of this quote

Name: Sender image URL
Description: URL to image of the sender avatar image to be set on the quote

Name: Sender job title
Description: Job title of the sender of this quote

Name: Sender last name
Description: Last name of the sender of this quote

Name: Sender phone number
Description: Phone number of the sender of this quote
